verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh Then the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, unto Moses עַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> 'at-Tah Now תִרְאֶ֔ה <S%H7200><s%> tir-'Eh, Now shalt thou see אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher what אֶֽעֱשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> 'e-'e-Seh what I will do לְפַרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> le-far-'Oh; to Pharaoh כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for בְיָ֤ד <S%H3027><s%> ve-Yad hand חֲזָקָה֙ <S%H2389><s%> cha-za-Kah for with a strong יְשַׁלְּחֵ֔ם <S%H7971><s%> ye-shal-le-Chem, shall he let them go וּבְיָ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> u-ve-Yad hand חֲזָקָ֔ה <S%H2389><s%> cha-za-Kah, and with a strong יְגָרְשֵׁ֖ם <S%H1644><s%> ye-ga-re-Shem shall he drive them out מֵאַרְצֽוֹ׃ <S%H776><s%> me-'ar-Tzo. of his land ס sa-Mek

וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him And God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh; unto Moses וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav about אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. unto him I [am] the LORD

וָאֵרָ֗א <S%H7200><s%> va-'e-Ra, And I appeared אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַבְרָהָ֛ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham unto Abraham אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יִצְחָ֥ק <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak unto Isaac וְאֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko and unto Jacob בְּאֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> be-'El by [the name of] God שַׁדָּ֑י <S%H7706><s%> shad-Dai; Almighty וּשְׁמִ֣י <S%H8034><s%> u-she-Mi but by my name יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, JEHOVAH לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo did not נוֹדַ֖עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> no-Da'-ti was I not known לָהֶֽם׃ la-Hem.

וְגַ֨ם <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam also הֲקִמֹ֤תִי <S%H6965><s%> ha-ki-Mo-ti And I have also established אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּרִיתִי֙ <S%H1285><s%> be-ri-Ti my covenant אִתָּ֔ם <S%H854><s%> 'it-Tam, for לָתֵ֥ת <S%H5414><s%> la-Tet with them to give לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz them the land כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an; of Canaan אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz the land מְגֻרֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H4033><s%> me-gu-rei-Hem of their pilgrimage אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which גָּ֥רוּ <S%H1481><s%> Ga-ru wherein they were strangers בָֽהּ׃ Vah.

וְגַ֣ם׀ <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam Furthermore אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I שָׁמַ֗עְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma'-ti, And I have also heard אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נַאֲקַת֙ <S%H5009><s%> na-'a-Kat the groaning בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim the Egyptians מַעֲבִדִ֣ים <S%H5647><s%> ma-'a-vi-Dim keep in bondage אֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam; וָאֶזְכֹּ֖ר <S%H2142><s%> va-'ez-Kor and I have remembered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּרִיתִֽי׃ <S%H1285><s%> be-ri-Ti. my covenant

לָכֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen Wherefore אֱמֹ֥ר <S%H559><s%> 'e-Mor say לִבְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> liv-nei- unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָה֒ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh I [am] the LORD וְהוֹצֵאתִ֣י <S%H3318><s%> ve-ho-tze-Ti and I will bring אֶתְכֶ֗ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem, מִתַּ֙חַת֙ <S%H8478><s%> mit-Ta-chat under סִבְלֹ֣ת <S%H5450><s%> siv-Lot you out from under the burdens מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, of the Egyptians וְהִצַּלְתִּ֥י <S%H5337><s%> ve-hitz-tzal-Ti and I will rid אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem מֵעֲבֹדָתָ֑ם <S%H5656><s%> me-'a-vo-da-Tam; you out of their bondage וְגָאַלְתִּ֤י <S%H1350><s%> ve-ga-'al-Ti and I will redeem אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem בִּזְר֣וֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> biz-Ro-a' out arm נְטוּיָ֔ה <S%H5186><s%> ne-tu-Yah, you with a stretched וּבִשְׁפָטִ֖ים <S%H8201><s%> u-vish-fa-Tim judgments גְּדֹלִֽים׃ <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lim. and with great

וְלָקַחְתִּ֨י <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-kach-Ti And I will take אֶתְכֶ֥ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem לִי֙ li לְעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> le-'Am, you to me for a people וְהָיִ֥יתִי <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yi-ti become לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem לֵֽאלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> le-lo-Him; and I will be to you a God וִֽידַעְתֶּ֗ם <S%H3045><s%> vi-da'-Tem, and ye shall know כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki that אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh that I [am] the LORD אֱלֹ֣הֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-Lo-hei-Chem, your God הַמּוֹצִ֣יא <S%H3318><s%> ham-mo-Tzi which bringeth אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem, מִתַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> mit-Ta-chat under סִבְל֥וֹת <S%H5450><s%> siv-Lot you out from under the burdens מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim. of the Egyptians

וְהֵבֵאתִ֤י <S%H935><s%> ve-he-ve-Ti And I will bring אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, you in unto the land אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which נָשָׂ֙אתִי֙ <S%H5375><s%> na-Sa-ti accept אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יָדִ֔י <S%H3027><s%> ya-Di, able לָתֵ֣ת <S%H5414><s%> la-Tet to give אֹתָ֔הּ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah, לְאַבְרָהָ֥ם <S%H85><s%> le-'av-ra-Ham it to Abraham לְיִצְחָ֖ק <S%H3327><s%> le-yitz-Chak to Isaac וּֽלְיַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> u-le-ya-'a-Ko; and to Jacob וְנָתַתִּ֨י <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti and I will give אֹתָ֥הּ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah לָכֶ֛ם la-Chem מוֹרָשָׁ֖ה <S%H4181><s%> mo-ra-Shah it you for an heritage אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. I [am] the LORD

וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> ken thus אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei so unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo did not שָֽׁמְעוּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> sha-me-'U but they hearkened אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, not unto Moses מִקֹּ֣צֶר <S%H7115><s%> mik-Ko-tzer for anguish ר֔וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach, of spirit וּמֵעֲבֹדָ֖ה <S%H5656><s%> u-me-'a-vo-Dah bondage קָשָֽׁה׃ <S%H7186><s%> ka-Shah. and for cruel פ Peh
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

בֹּ֣א <S%H935><s%> bo Go דַבֵּ֔ר <S%H1696><s%> dab-Ber, in speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about פַּרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh unto Pharaoh מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt וִֽישַׁלַּ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> vi-shal-Lach go out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- that he let the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel מֵאַרְצֽוֹ׃ <S%H776><s%> me-'ar-Tzo. of his land

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, And Moses לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying הֵ֤ן <S%H2005><s%> hen Behold בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- Behold the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- have not שָׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> sha-me-'U have not hearkened אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, to me וְאֵיךְ֙ <S%H349><s%> ve-'eiCh how יִשְׁמָעֵ֣נִי <S%H8085><s%> yish-ma-'E-ni hear פַרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> far-'Oh, unto me how then shall Pharaoh וַאֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni me עֲרַ֥ל <S%H6189><s%> 'a-Ral who [am] of uncircumcised שְׂפָתָֽיִם׃ <S%H8193><s%> se-fa-Ta-yim. band פ Peh

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and to אַהֲרֹן֒ <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron and unto Aaron וַיְצַוֵּם֙ <S%H6680><s%> vay-tzav-Vem and gave them a charge אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and to פַּרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh and unto Pharaoh מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt לְהוֹצִ֥יא <S%H3318><s%> le-ho-Tzi to bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt ס sa-Mek

אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These רָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei These [be] the heads בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> veit- houses אֲבֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tam; of their fathers' בְּנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The sons רְאוּבֵ֜ן <S%H7205><s%> re-'u-Ven of Reuben בְּכֹ֣ר <S%H1060><s%> be-Chor the firstborn יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel חֲנ֤וֹךְ <S%H2585><s%> cha-Noch Hanoch וּפַלּוּא֙ <S%H6396><s%> u-fal-Lu and Pallu חֶצְר֣וֹן <S%H2696><s%> chetz-Ron Hezron וְכַרְמִ֔י <S%H3756><s%> ve-char-Mi, and Carmi אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh these מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <S%H4940><s%> mish-pe-Chot these [be] the families רְאוּבֵֽן׃ <S%H7205><s%> re-'u-Ven. of Reuben

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons שִׁמְע֗וֹן <S%H8095><s%> shim-'on, of Simeon יְמוּאֵ֨ל <S%H3223><s%> ye-mu-'El Jemuel וְיָמִ֤ין <S%H3226><s%> ve-ya-Min and Jamin וְאֹ֙הַד֙ <S%H161><s%> ve-'O-had and Ohad וְיָכִ֣ין <S%H3199><s%> ve-ya-Chin and Jachin וְצֹ֔חַר <S%H6714><s%> ve-Tzo-char, and Zohar וְשָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> ve-sha-'Ul and Shaul בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֑ית <S%H3669><s%> hak-ke-na-'a-Nit; of a Canaanitish woman אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh these מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <S%H4940><s%> mish-pe-Chot these [are] the families שִׁמְעֽוֹן׃ <S%H8095><s%> shim-'on. of Simeon

וְאֵ֨לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh These שְׁמ֤וֹת <S%H8034><s%> she-Mot And these [are] the names בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the sons לֵוִי֙ <S%H3878><s%> le-Vi of Levi לְתֹ֣לְדֹתָ֔ם <S%H8435><s%> le-To-le-do-Tam, according to their generations גֵּרְשׁ֕וֹן <S%H1648><s%> ge-re-Shon Gershon וּקְהָ֖ת <S%H6955><s%> u-ke-Hat and Kohath וּמְרָרִ֑י <S%H4847><s%> u-me-ra-Ri; and Merari וּשְׁנֵי֙ <S%H8141><s%> u-she-Nei and the years חַיֵּ֣י <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yei of the life לֵוִ֔י <S%H3878><s%> le-Vi, of Levi שֶׁ֧בַע <S%H7651><s%> She-va' and seven וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֛ים <S%H7970><s%> u-she-lo-Shim thirty וּמְאַ֖ת <S%H3967><s%> u-me-'At [were] an hundred שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah. years

בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The sons גֵרְשׁ֛וֹן <S%H1648><s%> ge-re-Shon of Gershon לִבְנִ֥י <S%H3845><s%> liv-Ni Libni וְשִׁמְעִ֖י <S%H8096><s%> ve-shim-'I and Shimi לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4940><s%> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam. according to their families
